articles.title: Top news of the day | August 11, 2025
articles.description: Opposition leaders including Rahul Gandhi detained while taking out march against 'vote theft'; Centre pushes six bills without debate, and more. The major news headlines of the day and more.

articles.title: AP Top Stories August 11
articles.description: Here's the latest for Monday, August 11th: Netanyahu defends new Gaza offensive; Australia to recognize Palestinian state; Putin sticks to Ukraine demands ahead of planned Trump summit; Flooding in six Midwestern states.

articles.title: Five top headlines for Monday, Aug. 11, 2025
articles.description: Jefferson Humphreys has a quick look at the top headlines on CTV Morning Live Calgary for Monday, Aug. 11, 2025.
